A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie that takes all these fanboy theories and flips them on their heads with unpredictable and fresh takes on a new Star Wars story. I love how the Jedi orders hubris is finally addressed and it's burned to the ground. Of course Luke would ultimately learn the lesson that the force is bigger than the Jedis. The characters are developed and tragically complex rather than two dimensional heros.
